Description: The Rest on the Flight into Egypt; the Virgin sits under tree at left with infant Christ in her arms; Joseph at left holding donkey's reins offers fruit to the Virgin with his right hand; a landscape of fields and mountains extends behind them. c.1506 Engraving
Producer name: Print made by: Lucas van Leyden
Curator's comments: Bartsch suggests a date around 1508, while New Hollstein places it c.1506.
Bibliographic references: New Hollstein (Dutch & Flemish) / The New Hollstein: Dutch and Flemish etchings, engravings and woodcuts 1450-1700 (38) (Lucas van Leyden)
